status_message: New warnings about giving codeine to kids in cough syrup and other medicines are out from the FDA -- but critics say the agency didn't go far enough. Share your questions about kids and codeine here, and we might discuss it live on Facebook today, at 11 a.m. ET.

President Trump said he was sending an "armada" to deter North Korea. But the ships actually sailed in a completely different direction. What do you want to know about the turn of events?  Share your questions in the comments -- we might use them on Facebook Live today at 11 a.m. ET, when we talk about the USS Carl Vinson and its strike group.
